Daryl Morey

Houston Rockets, Philadelphia 76ers

Tenure: 2020 - 2024 · Points: 179137

Draft Rating:

S

Daryl Morey ranks in the 97th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Morey's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 15 spots higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Clint Capela with 25th pick but was worth 3th pick.
  • Drafted Chandler Parsons with 38th pick but was worth 10th pick.
  • Drafted Zhou Qi with 43th pick but was worth 24th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Marcus Morris with 14th pick but was worth 44th pick.
  • Drafted Aaron Brooks with 26th pick but was worth 36th pick.
  • Drafted Isaiah Canaan with 34th pick but was worth 38th pick.

Trade Rating:

B+

Daryl Morey ranks in the 77th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Cole Aldrich, Daequan Cook, James Harden, Lazar Hayward to HOU.
  • Lost Jeremy Lamb, Kevin Martin, Steven Adams, Álex Abrines, Mitch McGary to OKC.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Gary Forbes, Steven Adams to HOU.
  • Lost Kyle Lowry to TOR.

Signing Rating:

B+

Daryl Morey ranks in the 76th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed James Harden in 2016.
  • Signed James Harden in 2022.
  • Signed Trevor Ariza in 2009.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed P.J. Tucker in 2017.
  • Signed Eric Gordon in 2019.
  • Signed Corey Brewer in 2015.
